t2v-kamui-openai-sora.description: OpenAI Sora - State-of-the-art video generation with text-to-video, image-to-video (first frame reference), and remix capabilities. Two models available: 'sora-2' (fast, flexible, good for iteration) and 'sora-2-pro' (production-grade quality). Supports multiple resolutions (720p, 1080p, portrait HD), customizable duration, and 24-hour download URLs for generated videos via Kamui Code ⭐⭐⭐
